00053 void ezradioEnableAutoAck(EZRADIODRV_AutoAckHandle_t *autoAckHandle)
00054 {
00055   autoAckHandle->ackMode = ezradiodrvAutoAckImmediate;
00056 }

00067 void ezradioDisableAutoAck(EZRADIODRV_AutoAckHandle_t *autoAckHandle)
00068 {
00069   autoAckHandle->ackMode = ezradiodrvAutoAckDisabled;

00083 void ezradioSkipAutoAck(EZRADIODRV_AutoAckHandle_t *autoAckHandle)
00084 {
00085   autoAckHandle->ackMode = ezradiodrvAutoAckSkipOne;

00089 //  Note: These are internal routines used by ezradio plugin manager.

00091 /**************************************************************************/
00101 Ecode_t ezradioHandleAutoAckPlugin( EZRADIODRV_Handle_t radioHandle, EZRADIODRV_ReplyHandle_t radioReplyHandle )
00102 {
00103   //Silent warning.
00104   (void)radioReplyHandle;
00105 
00106   if ( radioHandle == NULL )
00107   {
00108     return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00109   }
00110 
00111   if ( radioHandle->autoAck.userCallback != NULL )
00112   {
00113     radioHandle->autoAck.userCallback( radioHandle, ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK );
00114   }
00115 
00116   /* Set packet type back to normal */
00117   radioHandle->packetTx.pktType = ezradiodrvPacketTypeNormal;
00118 
00119   return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00120 }
00121 
00122 /**************************************************************************/
00133 Ecode_t ezradioTransmitAutoAck(EZRADIODRV_Handle_t radioHandle)
00134 {
00135   if ( radioHandle == NULL )
00136   {
00137     return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00138   }
00139 
00140   /* Set packet type to auto ack */
00141   radioHandle->packetTx.pktType = ezradiodrvPacketTypeAutoAck;
00142 
00143   /* Start default or smart transmission depending on the auto ack packet mode configuration */
00144   if (radioHandle->autoAck.pktMode == ezradiodrvAutoAckPktDefault)
00145   {
00146     ezradioStartTransmitDefault( radioHandle, radioHandle->autoAck.pktBuf );
00147   }
00148   else
00149   {
00150     ezradioStartTransmitSmart( radioHandle, radioHandle->autoAck.lenConfig, radioHandle->autoAck.pktBuf );
00151   }
00152 
00153   return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00154 }
